name: 99 Species (Demo)
description:
“We’re living in the year 2099, in the worst possible dystopia. 

Mankind is living in agony on a dying planet. Capitalism and
neo-liberalism rules the world, replacing the old democracies. The
levels of pollution and poverty are extreme. Corporations are doing what
they want. And I, Luis Miranda, am just trying to survive another day
in this hell which someone has called incorrectly: ‘Life’.”
